page.title: 08HOUSING GARDENS
page.content: Outside my house I have got a front garden and a back garden.In 1984 we had a pond in our front garden but my dad gave away all the fish and filled the pond in.Where the pond was we didn't have any plants so my dad put our caravan there.A caravan is like a mini moving home.Our caravan is fifteen foot long.Beside the caravan there is a drive where we keep our cars.We have got a four wheel base Land Rover and a 1984 Fiesta.At the front of my garden we have got a wooden fence. My back garden has got a shed and a greenhouse in it.My dad keeps all his tools in his shed,like a hammer,a screw driver and lots of other tools.Next to the shed there is a greenhouse.In the greenhouse dad is growing lots of plants.He has got, tomato plants,lettuces,parsley
